title: NBA-balldontlie-moneyline
text: Welcome to the website of the nba-balldontlie-moneyline project! The goal of this project is to explore the balldontlie API data and its usefulness in predicting the outright winners of NBA games (i.e.Â the moneyline in betting terms).

title: data
text:
We obtained the data for \(2021\), \(2022\) and \(2023\) seasons using the API. The base data are the player statistics for each individual game. Given a player - game combination, we have the following fields available:



Statistic
Description
Example Value




MIN
Minutes a player was on court
26.03


FGM
Made field goals (2pt)
18


FGA
Attempted field goals (2pt)
6


FG_PCT
Percentage of successful field goals (2pt)
0.33


FG3M
Made field goals (3pt)
12


FG3A
Attempted field goals (3pt)
3


FG3_PCT
Percentage of successful field goals (3pt)
0.25
